column4: well it asks alot of questions... i would suggest doing this.
did you try "sudo apt-get install b43-fwcutter"
no i installed it by the package manager
just to tell you. i have installed the driver and i see my AP but it can't connect, it doesnt assign me ip
i know what your problem is... do what i said
then you are going to get instructions on how to set it up... you have to run a command after you reinstall with apt-get
ok i am trying that right now
what do you mean. Well it tells that it will be installed and it installs it , last line is Setting up b43-fwcutter (1:011-1) ...
if that doesn't work first do this.... " sudo apt-get remove --purge bcm43xx-fwcutter "
but i have already done sudo apt-get install b43-fwcutter
well my dell notebooks came with bcm , i hate it too
